name: Stop sign
description: To bring traffic to a stop

name: Stop sign
description: To bring traffic to a stop

name: Stop/Yield sign
description: To allow traffic turning left, to do so (if it can be done without interfering with cross traffic) without stopping

name: 3-way stop
description: To bring traffic from all three directions to a stop

name: 4-way stop
description: To bring traffic from all four directions to a stop

name: Yield sign
description: To indicate that you must yield to other traffic

name: Yield to pedestrians
description: To compel you to give priority to pedestrians crossing the road or wanting to cross the road

name: Yield at traffic circle
description: To warn you that there is a traffic circle ahead where they must expect to yield

name: No entry
description: To indicate that no traffic may proceed past the sign on the road, carriageway or lane

name: One-way roadway
description: To indicate that there is a one-way carriageway to the left, right, or ahead

name: One-way roadway
description: To indicate that there is a one-way carriageway to the left, right, or ahead

name: One-way roadway
description: To indicate that there is a one-way carriageway to the left, right, or ahead

name: Pedestrian priority
description: To give priority to pedestrians but limit other traffic to emergency vehicles, vehicles loading and off loading goods and maintenance vehicles

name: Yield to oncoming traffic
description: To indicate that there is a single carriageway ahead for use by by vehicle from both directions

name: Minimum speed sign
description: To regulate the minimum speed of traffic

name: Vehicles exceeding mass only
description: To compel drivers of certain heavy vehicles to use the road or part of the road indicated by this road traffic sign

name: Keep left
description: To indicate that you must drive to the left or right of an obstruction where the sign is displayed

name: Keep right
description: To indicate that you must drive to the left or right of an obstruction where the sign is displayed

name: Proceed left only
description: To indicate the direction in which you must proceed

name: Proceed right only
description: To indicate the direction in which you must proceed

name: Proceed straight only
description: To indicate the direction in which you must proceed

name: Turn left only
description: To indicate to drivers the direction in which they must turn at the intersection ahead

name: Turn right only
description: To indicate to drivers the direction in which they must turn at the intersection ahead

name: Pedestrians only
description: To indicate that the road or part of the road may be used by pedestrians only

name: Cyclists only
description: To indicate that the road or part of the road may be used by cyclists only

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate to cyclists and pedestrians which part of a road they must use

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate that part of the road is divided and that part may be used by cyclists and pedestrians only

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate to cyclists and pedestrians which part of a road they must use

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate that part of the road is divided and that part may be used by cyclists and pedestrians only

name: Motorcycles only
description: Indicate that a road or part of a road may be used by motorcyclists only

name: Motor cars only
description: Indicate that a road or part of a road may be used by motorcars only

name: Taxis only
description: To indicate that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by taxis

name: Minibuses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by minibuses

name: Midi buses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by midibuses

name: Buses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by buses

name: Delivery vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by delivery vehicles only

name: Goods vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by goods vehicles

name: Goods vehicles exceeding an indicated GVM
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by goods vehicles with a gross vehicle mass (GVM) or a gross combination mass (GCM) exceeding the mass indicated in tonnes by means of a number on such sign

name: Construction vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by construction vehicles

name: Vehicles transporting dangerous substances only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by vehicles conveying dangerous goods

name: Abnormal vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by abnormal vehicles

name: Rickshaws only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by rickshaws

name: Tour buses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by tour buses

name: Agricultural vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by agricultural vehicles

name: Animal-drawn vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by animal-drawn vehicles

name: Pay toll
description: To give you a last opportunity to follow an alternative route, or to proceed on the route and pay toll fees

name: Switch headlamps on
description: To indicate that you must switch on your headlights in order to see and be seen

name: Buses and minibuses only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by buses and minibuses

name: Buses and midi buses only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by buses and midibuses

name: Buses, midi buses and minibuses only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by buses, midibuses and minibuses

name: Roundabout
description: To indicate that you must move in a clockwise direction at the junction
